name: Wordle
description: Guess the 5-letter word in 6 tries. A new puzzle every day!

name: Connections
description: Find groups of four items that share something in common.

name: Crosswordle
description: A crossword puzzle meets Wordle. Fill in the crossword grid!

name: Sumplete 5x5
description: Delete numbers so the remaining numbers add up to the target sum (5x5 grid).

name: Sumplete 7x7
description: Delete numbers so the remaining numbers add up to the target sum (7x7 grid).

name: Mathler Easy
description: Find the hidden calculation that equals the target number.

name: Mathler
description: Find the hidden calculation that equals the target number.

name: Mathler Hard
description: Find the hidden calculation that equals the target number.

name: Mathler Killer
description: Find the hidden calculation that equals the target number.

name: Queens
description: Place queens on the board so none can attack each other.

name: Kakuro Conquest
description: Fill the grid with numbers that add up to the given sums.

name: Sudoku.com
description: Classic number puzzle - fill the 9x9 grid with digits 1-9.

name: Hitori Conquest
description: Eliminate numbers to ensure no duplicates in any row or column.

name: Tango
description: Match pairs by connecting them with a path of no more than 3 lines.

name: Waffle
description: Swap letters to make valid words in this crossword-style puzzle.

name: Word Salad
description: Find hidden words in a jumbled grid of letters.

name: Squeezy
description: Squeeze the blocks together to match the target pattern.

name: Letter Boxed
description: Connect letters around the box to form words that use all letters.

name: Quordle
description: Solve four Wordles at once with nine guesses.

name: Octordle
description: Solve eight Wordles simultaneously with 13 guesses.

name: Sedecordle
description: The ultimate challenge - solve 16 Wordles at once!

name: Duotrigordle
description: Extreme Wordle variant - solve 32 puzzles simultaneously.

name: Globle
description: Guess the mystery country using distance clues on a globe.

name: Metazooa
description: Guess the animal based on close-up photos and clues.

name: WikiGame Daily
description: Navigate from one Wikipedia page to another using only links.

name: Canuckle
description: Canadian-themed Wordle with uniquely Canadian words and references.

name: Strands
description: Find themed words that connect across the letter grid.

name: Contexto
description: Guess the secret word using contextual similarity clues.

name: Couples
description: Match pairs based on logical relationships and patterns.

name: Dordle
description: Solve two Wordles simultaneously with seven guesses.

name: Murdle
description: Solve daily murder mystery logic puzzles with deductive reasoning.

name: Semantle
description: Guess the secret word using semantic similarity scores.

name: Cell Tower
description: Place numbers in a grid so each region contains consecutive numbers.

name: Worldle
description: Guess the country based on its silhouette with distance and direction clues.
Slide numbered tiles to combine them and reach the 2048 tile.

name: Nerdle
description: Guess the hidden mathematical equation in 6 tries.

name: KenKen 5x5
description: Fill the grid using math operations and logic in cages.

name: Squaredle
description: Find words in a grid by connecting adjacent letters.

name: Polygonle
description: Guess the country from its simplified polygon shape.

name: Phrasle
description: Guess the common phrase or saying in this Wordle-style game.

name: Redactle Unlimited
description: Guess the Wikipedia article by revealing redacted words.
